description: We use a combination of double-fold Mexican vanilla extract and Madagascar bourbon vanilla paste for this classic flavor.

flavor: Cookie Butter Snickerdoodle with Pumpkin Caramel Swirl
description: Cookie butter ice cream with chunks of housemade snickerdoodles and a pumpkin caramel swirl.
